flawed_nl_solution:
He needs food for 21 days because 3 x 7 = <<3*7=21>>21
The puppy will eat 63/1 cups of food because 21 x (1/3) = <<21*(1/3)=63/1>>63/1
He needs 18 bags of food because 63/1 / 3.5 = <<63/1/3.5=18>>18
The food will cost him $36 because 18 x 2 = <<18*2=36>>36
It will cost $46 in total because 10 + 36 = <<10+36=46>>46
#### 46

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 63/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
